message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $22,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $19,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $19,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $14,000?
